To find the source of these so called ''Nightmare'' creatures and to save his brother, who is headed to the mountain, the player has to embark on a journey to the top of the mountain. Making their way to the top, the player will face more enemies, puzzles, landmarks and characters along their adventure to reveal the truth.

name: Wolfenstein 3D VR
description:
On May 5, 1992, id Software released Wolfenstein 3D. Known as the grandfather of modern first-person shooters and groundbreaking in it's design, Wolfenstein 3D set a new, higher standard for action games.

In 1993, Alternate Worlds Technology, Inc. (AWT) first attempted to bring Wolfenstein to virtual reality. With the use of Polhemus tracker technology, they created an arcade-style head-mounted display version of Wolf3D aptly named "Wolfenstein VR."

Now, modern virtual reality tech allows us to step inside the castle once again in this tribute to one of the greatest games ever made.

Presented here is the "shareware release" of Wolfenstein 3D as you've never experienced it before. Brave ten levels of labyrinth-like halls, killer dogs, secret passages, and an army of Nazi forces as you try to make your daring escape in Wolfenstein 3D VR!

name: Silent Hill 2.5
description:
Silent Hill 2.5 is a fangame developed by s5zone intertwining Silent Hill 2 and Silent Hill 3.

You appear as Heather at the same place where James in Silent Hill 2 went to the city. While you browse through locations you meet Valtiel, who tries to open a gateway to the second part of the map for you. In order for him to do it, you must collect bunnies scattered all over the map. The more bunnies you pick up, the more monsters come at you. When you pick up all bunnies, you run to the final door and the second part of the game begins. During the final run to the end, Alessa appears and shows you the direction you should go towards the end. The events of this game happen after Silent Hill 3, when Heather tries to leave Silent Hill but for some reason, she must go back to it.

name: Tally Castle
description:
Tally Castle is a math based dungeon crawler where you solve puzzles.

The puzzles are based on how the order of calculations affect the end result.

The objective is to tally the numbers in each room so they match the number in the door.

If you are good at math you can analyze and excecute but if you are not you can just play around with some trial and error.

You may learn stuff by accident!

name: Hexagourds
description:
Hexagourds is a casual, relaxing builder and puzzle game where you place tiles on a grid to make your own pumpkin patch! Grow pumpkins, feed animals, and pick apples as you gain points for rotating, placing and connecting different tiles.

If you're in love with the fall season or are in need of a relaxing game to distract you from the stressful day-to-day activities of life, then Hexagourds is definitely for you. This game has no winning or losing. You play at your own pace, gaining points for placing tiles wherever you want. You place some pumpkins here, some goats there, and haybales everywhere. This game was meant to be played on a chill, autumn Sunday morning with a coffee next to you. I hope you try it out and enjoy the game.

For those more strategically inclined, there is definitely some strategy involved with maximizing points. I've added dailies and a mutliplayer scoreboard if you want to show the rest of the community your sweet score in Hexagourds. But that's all up to you.

name: The Clock Chronicle
description:
Can you solve the clock's mystery?

The Central Clock is a barrier. A barrier separating the two rivalling countries, Zethania and Palymr. But when the clock breaks, war is on the verge of starting any time.

You were suddenly transferred to the Ithel Continent by an strange mage after being instructed to fix the problem at hand... but the clock hides a secret in its history that no one knows...

Now it's your turn to decide. Which side will you choose?

Eat fruit, avoid poop, flowers increase the score multiplier, eating flowers makes the multiplier smaller.

name: Threadbound
description: Use magical yarn to bind the fates of objects, enemies, and yourself in this puzzle-platformer.

name: Warped Space Shooter
description: A Godot Game Template made in Pixel Art

name: Swamp Alchemy
description: Aid humanity with ancient swamp magic

name: Dreaming by day
description: a game about memes and dreams.

name: ViviDex
description: A pastel-punk beat'em up that stars a magical fighting duo Vivi and Dex.

name: Bloop
description: Submission for Ludum Dare 47: "Stuck in a loop"

name: Magic Mirror Hall
description: Remedy a relationship plagued by a magical malady (and repression)

name: Cobble and Trouble
description: Craft golems, shoot at ennemies and defend your forge!

name: Devil of the Mirror
description: Striving to escape her futile existence, a lonely and sick girl is performing a spell upon a mirror, wishing for friends and for a better life... But she didn't know that the mirror she used was holding a demonic entity in it. Will that spell be a blessing for the girl... or a curse?

name: Colors of Your World
description: A platforming adventure about the colors of life.

name: Thermal Power Plant K-13
description: Made for Ludum Dare 39. A post-apocalyptic game about a group of survivors who have built their town around a giant thermal plant.

name: Stomper
description: A short platform game

name: Wonderful Duck
description: A marvellous duck little adventures

name: Pico Pico MicroMix
description: A rhythm-based game in the style of Dance Dance Revolution for PICO-8.

name: Crowded Dungeon Crawler
description: Dungeon Crawler or Puzzle? Both!

name: Duck Duck Plays the Blues
description: Play the blues like a duck!

name: Elementalist: 0
description: 2D fantasy action brawler

name: Box of Limes
description: Box of Limes is a mix of Tetris and Lemmings.

name: One to Three: Sovereignty
description: Root out the imposters, choose who inherits the throne, and fall in love?

name: Stone Cold Sexy
description: pose 4 peeps

name: Love Lime!
description: Date fruit or turn human again? Maybe even both?

name: Into the Box
description: Psychedelic chiptuned dizzy game

name: Pröng
description: Pröng is a mutant game of pong. Also a techno-thriller dating sim.

name: Toc
description: Jump into your friends minds and help them escape prison!

name: Sludge & Sorcery
description: A Gameboy Game for GBJam8

name: Fulcrum Frenzy
description: Fulcrum Frenzy is an arcade-like balancing game.

name: Scrapmetalship
description: Made for Ludum Dare 35.

name: Trihard
description: Intense high score based Pico 8 game

name: After the End with Miaobot
description: Explore the post-war ruins of your city with a robotic cat who wants to be your friend

name: Check in the Back
description: Work Lost-and-Found at a convention!

name: Gongbat
description: The power of sound drives this explosive shooter!

name: SyntaxBomb
description: full-on retro-tastic action

name: Interstellar Connection
description: Help a lonely spaceship pilot make a connection

name: Rogues Like Beer
description: Sacrifices must be made, if you want to drink with your brigade!

name: Fort Loop
description: Escape the looping castle!

name: Little Beetle Bottle Battle
description: (or little BEETLE BATTLE for short, little BATTLE for shorter, L for shortest)

name: Fruitwolf
description: A wolf in the forest, collecting fruit and surviving the wilderness

name: Bipo's Adventure
description: A short platformer.

name: Doukutsu Demake
description: A Doukutsu Demake, made in Pico8 by us at DoubtfulGames.

name: Achilles vs. Turtles
description: Shoot turtles sweet spots and defend your heel

name: Gratia
description: A narritive RPG about gratitude!

name: Yokoi-san Warp
description: Sin descripción

name: Crystals of Amalgam
description: Match 3 with color blend

name: Bad Luck Cat
description: What's the worst that can happen?

name: The Consequences of Gardening
description: Feed your plant, Gertrude, by all means necessary. It might require some sacrifice...

name: HeroxTrio
description: Magical boys and cute mascots

name: Wall Clip
description: A fast-paced single-button platformer. Build up speed and clip through walls!

name: Rob'n Run
description: A retro puzzle platformer with speedrun gameplay .

name: Spear of Despair
description: A game about knight, who enjoys being main character too much.

name: The Legend of Heavenly Mist
description: A Boys Love Visual novel about the legend of a mountain.

name: Rogue
description: A Gay Point-And-Click Thriller

name: Flour Hour
description: Romance the grumpy ex or the cheerful city boy? (BL)

name: Gay Zodiac
description: A Yaoi game where you date Zodiac Signs.

name: Summer at Marisol Bay
description: A summer themed SFW yaoi visual novel!

name: Rootless
description: When a mysterious rebel loans you a sentient plant-creature, you go on a quest to find it some snacks.

name: Mannequin Academy
description: Yaoi Omegaverse Visual Novel

name: Lilian: The beginning of the end
description: An angel falls in love with a boy who talks to the skies. Who is he talking to?

name: Invisible Beasts
description: Visual novel based on a legend from Venice - EN and IT

name: All Men Are Pigs
description:
A queer and raunchy adult comedy with a tropical flavor. As the main character, you get to move to a Caribbean island named Santa Locura, working the summer away in a bar named The Inqueersition.

Your day to day routine gets derailed by the men you meet, all of them hiding a dealbreaker in their closet. What IS their deal? WHY is it so hard to find a proper man? Do you even NEED a man?

...well, this is a dating sim, so we’ll go with “yes”.

You will get to interact with your friends, coworkers and possible love interests in a variety of ways. Will you manage to land the man of your dreams and love him despite the issues they might have, or will they chew you up and spit you like gum?

name: Deep in the Forest
description: A medieval fantasy BL Visual Novel in English and Spanish, Demo available

name: Xenopathy
description: Experience the romance, drama, and mystery of humanity from the outside

name: Crossed Paths
description: A BL/Yaoi love story centered around in New York City

name: Bara Boarders
description: Bara Surfer VN Dating Game where you are a newbie surfer on an idyllic beach in Hawaii. Featuring 3 Buff Love Interests and 9 Endings.

name: A Cat Cafe Story
description: Ertal Games' Visual Novels characters as cats

name: Fleeting JKT
description: A Non-Explicit Strip JanKen Game!

name: The Love Interests get their Own Game
description: When the rejected love interests of another game get together, they experience a cute and wholesome first date.

name: Defying Heaven's Will
description: A BL murder mystery in xianxia setting!

name: Other Minds
description: Brutal collectathon platforming action with added mind control

name: Momoe Link
description:
Momoe is an active and sweet pink cybergirl who loves to sing. She has many friends, great career...

But for now, she decided to take a break and visit her friends. There are Jambu, Shade, and... Candy.
But wait! The real reason behind all that is... a love confession from somebody?!

name: Marigold
description: Lost in space and moments away from death, what do you do?

name: Spacelords: the unofficial visual novel
description: Sin descripción

name: Two Peas in a pod
description: Two gays wander around an island and talk non-stop

name: Omniswarm
description: COMPLETE THE SWARM!

name: Shadow over Normoth
description:
Taking inspiration from PS1 classics like Resident Evil and Silent Hill, Shadow over Normoth sets out to bring you back to the original survival horror experience. With fixed cameras, tank controls and visuals that are reminiscent of the good old days, you will truly feel like it's 1996 again.

Unravel the mystery behind the town of Normoth, gather resources and survive the horrors of this forsaken place. You will once again enter the world of survival horror ... good luck!

name: Now You've Made Me Crabby
description: Does running from your problems count as exercise?

name: Skelemania
description: Explore the colorful underground as an agile skeleton!

name: The Right Turn
description: Manipulate the game world, to control the player!

name: Mirage Motel
description: Spooks and scares await two guys when they stop at a motel for the night

name: Northbury Grove: Walls Closing In
description: At the tattered ends of trauma...can you survive the Butcher of Northbury Grove one last time?

name: Shadows of a Sunless World
description: Echolocation based horror game.

name: Detect Occult
description: A side-scrolling horror investigation game.

name: SpookWave
description: Sin descripción

name: The Midnight Park
description: Sin descripción

name: Bloodbath
description: Blood, Gore and Dismemberment Simulation.

name: Drunk
description: "I wanted this"

name: Walk Home
description: You walk home after a short visit to someone close to you...

name: No Transmission
description: Run! Kill! Dance! Repeat!

name: La Vie en Rose
description: In this beautiful rose-coloured world, which path will our love lead to?

name: Balance of Power
description: Demo for the 'Balance of Power' visual novel.

name: Play Dead! #2
description: A story about a band, and their strange life on the road accompanied by a surprisingly lively dead dog.

name: Hedon Bloodrite
description: Immerse yourself in a crystalpunk underworld where the visceral combat of the 90s' FPS games blends with the exploration and puzzle solving of classic dungeon crawlers and adventure games.

name: Xenno the Rogue
description: 2D Action RPG Platformer - Dystopian Medieval Fantasy

name: Pass On
description: Dash through the darkness and avoid its undead dangers to save the lost souls of the night!

name: The Theater
description: The old creepypasta legend has been reborn! The spiral head man continues to haunt you throughout the theater. This time it's a point and click thriller which gives you quicker access to many parts of the theater finding clues to the reality that surrounds you. It's unpredictable what comes next in each walkthrough. It could be a strange paranormal haunting you or it could be nothing. As you dig deeper into the walkthroughs, you'll soon start to find out that its more than just a game...

name: Sins
description: A nightmare about going home.

name: Solm
description: A puzzle RPG game where a young boy must escape a school while avoiding deadly creatures.

name: Deosurge
description: Live out Luna Blood's last moments and shoot your way through a Philadelphia crack den!

name: Chop
description: A local multiplayer fighting game with a unique twist.

name: Enter the Skinja
description: When cowboys and ninjas meet strange things happen... This was made for Haunted PS1 Jam 2020. It is an experiment in 2d & 3d space...a skins-periment.

name: Super Bash Goats
description: Make a bloody mess by bashing your friends into rocks and be the last goat standing in this local multiplayer brawler!

name: Saprophyte
description: It learns. It WILL find you.

name: The Deep Dark Woods
description: Mama has gone missing. It's up to you to save her.

name: Mauvairdenai
description: A dark adventure game about suffering

name: Piece by Piece
description: "Piece by piece, we'll find it again..."

name: Onward Blocks
description: puzzle fighting blocks!

name: Arcadea
description: Follow Maisie on a quest across the fantastical world of Arcadea to find someone precious to her....

name: The Ocean at Night
description:
In this all ages BL visual novel, you will play as Kova - a long-struggling overworker who desperately wishes to forget his past. Consumed by work, he doesn't have the time to think, to dream, until Nero crashes into his life.

The young Nero is everything he's not - and he finds himself being drawn in deeper and deeper into his life.

Will you reach an ending where they can both be happy?

name: The Inn Between
description: A modern fantasy BL Visual Novel following a young mans journey into a parallel world to recover the past he's lost, and find his missing family. Alongside 3 attractive romance options, Myka Riley delves into the unknown.

name: Ugby Mumba 3
description: Run and gun with Mumba on his quest to rescue his girlfriend and his eggs from the clutches of evil!

name: Untamed
description: A Soulsborne inspired boss-battle

name: Ghost King's Revenge
description: Save your bands mascot Nomu Kid from the dastardly Ghost King

name: Shovel or Whip
description: Sin descripción

name: Contemporary Gods
description: Befriend terrible gods to save the world! (Gender Choice X B/G/NB)

name: Phantom Seeds
description: The events of this mysterious and sad tale take place in the traditional Asian rural landscape, and start on the day that a curious looking child enters a small village...

name: Asimov Incident
description: Sin descripción

name: Dungeon Pest Control
description: Dungeon themed puzzle game

name: Batlight Runner
description: Batlight is a dark platform-runner game that will make you die again and again (evil laugh here).

name: The Polaroid
description: Stuck in a room with only your polaroid camera, solve the puzzles of the photos to escape.

name: Darkness Dwells
description: Are you brave enough to find out what Dwells in the Dark?

name: Honey Sweet Lies
description:
Discover the truth - but at what cost?

Honey Sweet Lies is a psychological horror mystery visual novel project. Throughout the game, you have 5 opportunities to ask various characters questions. But, be aware of getting too close to the truth, as some truths can be too hard to handle.

Pay attention to the World Warning System; a sign that you’re getting close to an unwanted truth, and to proceed and make decisions carefully.

name: Encore: Summer
description: A Short and Melancholic Kinetic/Visual Novel

name: Claude and the Phantom
description: A cartoon point-and-click adventure about a cursed painting and a ghost cat.

name: Disir
description: The protective spirit of this town's small temple finds herself evicted after a devastating fire, leaving her without home or memory. Unknowing of the reasons for such fire, now she must ask for help from her mythical friends to solve this mystery before it's too late.

name: Wails For Freedom
description: Escape a haunted Asylum whilst riding on a wheelchair. Can you escape with your sanity or will madness consume you?

name: Sea of Graves
description: A story of a dark history catching up to the future.

name: Of Blood and Shadows
description: Sin descripción

name: Trapped in the Station Late at Night
description: A short, point-and-click, escape the train station horror game.

name: Tom Clancy's Rainbow Six Siege: Crystal Guard
description:
Introducing Crystal Guard, Rainbow Six Siege's third season of Year 6! This season, we're introducing our latest Operator, Osa, an engineering prodigy from Croatia who brings expertise to Nighthaven with her quick wits and unapologetic enthusiasm for '60s sci-fi movies.

This season is packed with a plethora of updates including changes to Operator armor and DBNO scoring as well as balancing for Twitch, IQ, Mute, and Fuze. Players also have a new way to customize Elite Uniforms.

name: Castle Morihisa
description: Castle Morihisa is a roguelike strategic deck-builder. You need to build up your deck through constant battles, acquire powerful talents, and wield the power of the Fallen Heroes to unveil the truth behind the rebellion in Castle Morihisa. When facing difficulties, you could also ask for assistance from the Sengoku fallen heroes with different skills, which could give you an edge during the battles.

name: Tom Clancy's Rainbow Six Siege: High Calibre
description:
Rainbow Six Siege introduces the fourth season of Year 6, High Calibre! Our newest Operator, Thorn, joins Rainbow as a Technical Weapons Expert from Ireland's Emergency Response Unit. Never one to back down from a challenge, her strength and leadership set a new course for Rainbow. Her Razorbloom Shell proximity grenade is as sharp as her temper.

This season we've integrated some select updates including Team Colors, a Bulletproof Camera Rework and changes on the Test Server. We're bringing balance to Finka, Drone Counters, Elite 2.0, and more! Read the Patch Notes below for full details.

name: For Honor: Season 19 - Tempest
description: Year of the Covenants: Season 3, named "Tempest," is the nineteenth season of the ongoing Faction War. Warriors prayed for an answer for their parched throats during the drought... and it was answered. But, the answer these warriors received from their gods was much more than simple rain, but a roaring storm, ready to wipe all who remained unprepared.

name: Romancing Kanon: Eien no Shoujo Densetsu
description: RPG game released in 2002 in the Japanese comic market. The latest version is 1.5 A.

name: Conqueror's Blade: Season IX - Tyranny
description: The new Seasonal Campaign invites you to rise up against an evil Tyrant with your rebel armies, take back the devastated Borderlands, and claim epic rewards from the Battle Pass.

name: Sea of Thieves: Season 5
description: Grab a grog and don your best party finery – Sea of Thieves Season Five’s boatload of Voyage-enhancing features arrives December 2nd! Bury loot for safety or share your treasure maps with curious crews, employ fresh strategies and schemes with the Cannon Rowboat or simply celebrate another year of free content updates by pulling up a pew to ‘ooh’ and ‘ahh’ at a flashy fireworks display. No matter what style of scoundrel you play, there’s sure to be something for you to enjoy!

name: PUBG: Battlegrounds - Season 13
description: Season 13 will introduce a series of updates to the recently released Taego map, which is set in 1980s South Korea. Chief among these updates is the introduction of the Taego Secret Room, which will randomly spawn on the map and contains some of the best gear Survivors can find. However, players will have to discover a secret key before they can access the Secret Room!

name: One by One
description: Human phobias have awoken in this dark roguelike shooter One by One! Collect powerful artifacts and descend into random dungeons full of monsters and huge boss fights. Use your soul — an ultimate weapon that uncovers enemy weaknesses.

name: Langton's Ant
description: Based on simple inputs, amazing patterns can be achieved!

name: PUBG: Battlegrounds - Season 14
description:
First up in this Season is the ability to pick up and carry a downed survivor. You can now throw them over your shoulders and bring them with you to victory.

Next up, Taego has received a lot of changes. Additional covers are added in some areas, and the terrain has also received improvements. Furthermore, Breakable Pots have items inside so break and loot! Error Space are special new zones marked on the map that can spawn items featured in other Battlegrounds, so make sure to check the map for locations.

In addition, Taego and Paramo have been added to the Ranked. The rulesets have also been changed accordingly, so check out the details below. Many changes have been made to Erangel’s hot place Pochinki, along with the Pony Coupe and Porter, Halloween decor and weather on Erangel, the new Trick-or-Treat Progressive M416, and more.

name: PUBG: Battlegrounds - Season 15
description: Season 15 comes to you with a map service update, a new vehicle (the mountain bike). balance and world updates, as well as some Christmas themed fun!

name: Ghostrunner: Project Hel
description:
Take control of Hel, one of the original games’ bosses, as she descends Dharma Tower on a bloody quest of her own. Designed to appeal to new players and veterans, she’s more combat-oriented and can survive an additional attack compared to the Ghostrunner.

Run on walls, soar through neon cityscapes, and slice through six levels while mastering Hel’s powers through her own ability progression system. Battle new enemies and bosses to the beat of six fresh tracks courtesy of electronic musician Daniel Deluxe.

name: AirlineSim
description: In AirlineSim, players build their own virtual airlines using realistic fleet management, flight scheduling, network planning and monitoring tools. Get ready to compete for passengers in a real time market and make your airline stand out from the others in this browser-based simulation game!

name: Terminator: Resistance - Annihilation Line
description: Annihilation Line is a new narrative DLC campaign for Terminator: Resistance and picks up mid-way through the main campaign story. The DLC sees Jacob Rivers and a small team of Resistance soldiers led by Kyle Reese heading into the most dangerous territory imaginable...the land beyond the Annihilation Line.

name: Dead Cells: The Queen and the Sea
description: Dead Cells: The Queen & the Sea will conclude the DLC trilogy that began with The Bad Seed in 2020 and continued with Fatal Falls in 2021. The new expansion will introduce two new biomes, called "The Infested Shipwreck" and "The Lighthouse"), new weapons, and of course a magnificent boss, which once you will be allowed to finish an alternate ending.

name: WinBrick 2000
description: Sin descripción

name: Pixel Dash
description: A pixel platformer with many elements and levels.

name: CRSED: F.O.A.D. - Ice Age
description: There will be a lot of new items for the upcoming season, including new challenges, new items and ways to customize your champion, but that definitely isn’t all! In the new season, you’ll learn to be afraid of the cold, meet new Spirit Guardians, be able to shoot more effectively, and reveal new benefits of the Battle Pass!

name: Monopoly Solitaire
description: Classic Solitaire meets Monopoly in this new mash-up brought to you by Hasbro and the original creators of Solitaire! Now is your chance to play these two classic games for FREE and become a Monopoly millionaire. Easy to play but impossible to put down, MONOPOLY Solitaire is a relaxing card game with an exciting twist. Earn Monopoly Bucks and roll the dice as you play each solitaire hand. Work your way along the Boardwalk, collecting properties and building houses and hotels as you go. You’ll use your hard-earned cash from playing solitaire! Puzzle your way through each solitaire challenge to earn more rolls and get ahead of your opponents. Collect rent from all your properties and ace the game by being the richest landlord on the Boardwalk!

name: Om Nom Idle Candy Factory
description: Sin descripción

name: Downhill Smash
description: Smash everything on your way downhill to victory! Be faster than the avalanche by boosting your crushing boulder machine with unique and deadly weapons from a wide selection!

name: CRSED: F.O.A.D. - Rock Solid
description: Welcome to the new season and the ‘Rock Solid’ major update in CRSED: F.O.A.D.!

name: CRSED: F.O.A.D. - Claws
description:
Long time familiar game mechanics will be transformed with this update! A new looting and inventory interface, changed Dark Zone mechanics, more user friendly ammo boxes instead of clips and magazines.

New weapons, outfits, tombstones with astonishing effects will make this season fun, and all those new things you can test in the “Game of Crowns” - where everyone is hunting the one.

name: CRSED: F.O.A.D. - Fangs
description: As you already know, the new season brings many new opportunities to outsmart, trap, and destroy your opponents, but that's not all!

name: Spellbreak: Chapter 2 - The Fracture
description: Play the new Dominion 5v5 capture and control mode as you rank-up in competitive Leagues and join the struggle against the nefarious Vowkeepers.

name: Spellbreak: Chapter 1 - The Spellstorm
description:
“We have to stop it. But in order to do that…we need you.”
Welcome to Chapter 1: The Spellstorm!

name: Mythic Heroes
description:
Dark forces threaten the fate of the world, but you are not alone!
Summon an army of unique Gods and Heroes from distinct cultures to create your own elite team.
You can then enhance their abilities with powerful new skills, unlock their iconic weapons, and strengthen them for epic battles.
Your game will even collect rewards while you are AFK to help you save the realm!

name: The Sims 4: Modern Menswear Kit
description: Revolutionize the classics with The Sims 4: Modern Menswear Kit, featuring a thought-provoking, accessible collection designed by Stefan Cooke. Reimagined shapes redefine traditionally masculine fashions, while textiles and patterns elevate each unique piece for today's style.

name: Dementia
description: Psychological horror in the body of a dementia sufferer

name: The Labyrinth
description: Team up with an unlikely ally to escape the Labyrinth!

name: Pam's Room
description: A cute little escape room game

name: Hexblade
description: Take the curse sword and fight against the Blademaster and his monsters.

name: Broken Silence
description: A life-or-death escape from a killer's clutches.

name: Unthread
description: Sin descripción

name: The Basement
description: A surreal little Pixelart Tale about light, dark and broken families

name: Showa Summer Festival Story
description: As you progress through the game, old-fashioned "summer memory goods" will be registered in the picture book. Nostalgic! Showa Summer Festival Story is full of nostalgic memories, from those items that make you feel uncomfortable, to items that are a little painful.

name: Chrono Alice
description:
Included in the Story Me app.

Alice is a high schooler living in the "Showa" period, who meets a boy named Sho in the library, and the two instantly fall for each other. However, you find out that he's a high schooler from the "Reiwa" period. As "time" itself acts as a barrier for the two lovers, Alice also finds out that the library is struggling to stay open......

name: A Sister's Journey
description: Explore a charmingly beautiful, hand-crafted pixel art world and help Violet on her journey searching for her sister. Uncover its mysteries, face its threatening foes, and run 'n gun your way through this challenging action-metroidvania - which will put your true platforming skills to the test.

name: DNAxCat
description: In the virtual adventure world of DNAxCat, players can raise and breed a variety of cute meow warriors and fight side by side with them. And players can get more rewards through daily missions, PVE, and PVP systems in the game. At the same time, DNAxCat is also an economy in which ownership is totally decided by players, allowing players to seamlessly sell and trade their game assets into Token. DNAxCat wants to lead the trend of GameFi and “Play To Earn”, allowing players to earn by playing games.

name: Diverse Order
description: Sin descripción

name: Room of Batik
description: Batik themed escape room puzzle game.

name: The Rise of Dracula
description: You are Dracula and do what Dracula would do.

name: Bunker Bound
description: Sin descripción

name: Inheritance
description: Short spooky escape room

name: A Hole to Another Place SCP-1437
description: Short Experience with SCP-1437

name: Nikhoj
description: Sin descripción

name: Escape the Slender forest
description: Escape the Slender forest is a free Creepypasta visual novel made with Ren'Py.

name: The Escape
description: Sin descripción

name: Chimps on a Blimp
description:
GHXYK2, Swee Neezy, PilotRedSun, Penneh2006, GHXXXYK2, wolfpupy and Nick Flanagan present the 20th century’s hardest dirigible escape game:

Grow a brain to solve puzzles
Celebrate the Titanic of the dust bowl era.
How will the search for Amelia Earhart ever end?
Air Bud? Air Foe? Air Force One?
The Red Baron can spot any plane on the horizon.

But he couldn’t see this coming.

name: Ribeye Charlie's
description: Sin descripción

name: This Room Will Kill You
description: You're never getting out. Seriously.

name: Ze Field
description: Help a zebra get his stripes

name: Escape from witch cottage!
description: Magic Escape The Room

name: Room 303
description: In the darkest recesses of every mind something remains dormant, waiting for a moment to take control.

name: Soft Drizzle: B-Track
description: A tiny visual novel about friendship and Halloween festivals. With an escape room!

name: Present Quest
description: A Visual Novel Life Simulator Mini Escape Room Christmas Adventure

name: EscapeOne Web
description: Sin descripción

name: OldComputerArchive.zip
description: The first file browser-based escape game !

name: Escape Vauban
description: Escape from a small abandoned apartment.

name: Scope
description: You find yourself locked in a strange house... Collect items and solve the puzzles to escape!

name: Noodle Escape
description: Noodle wants to go outside!

name: The Coven of P.S. 13
description: A ttrpg about a coven of high school witches.

name: Isekai Bus for the Hope of Another World
description: You're dead to this world. But the next world holds so much more.

name: Haikyuu Escape Room
description: An escape room adventure with the Karasuno VBC!

name: Thunder Bella the Cloud Chaser
description: Can you beat the evil thundercloud?

name: Incite
description: Resist or Obey. The choice is yours.

name: Covenant Blade
description: Story-based miniature action game

name: Facets
description: Don't give up yet.

name: Invert Y
description: A quick escape game where you have to go out the fastest way possible! Made for the WGJ147 with the theme INVISIBLE

name: Crisis
description: Flawed heroes trying to save a flawed city. Which will break first?

name: Guillotine Earrings
description: A solo RPG about jewellery and revolution.

name: Paranormal
description: A collaborative storytelling game between the living, and the dead

name: Penny Dragon
description: A GM-less, co-operative game about little dragons.

name: The Umberdred Institute for Emerging Evildoers
description: Tell silly stories about aspiring villains accepting unlikely quests to earn dubious certifications in evildoing skills.

name: I Came Here to Win
description: High-stakes, high-drama Reality TV Roleplaying

name: Ruins
description: A massively multiplayer single player tabletop computer roleplaying game by Ash McAllan

name: Small Town Rocket Ship
description: Small Adventures Towards the Great Beyond

name: Horse Girl
description: A solo journalling RPG where you are a girl with a horse

name: The Tyrant's Dream
description:
The Tyrant's Dream is a GM-less microgame about the power of prophecy.
Play as a Magus in a decadent court, and try to unravel the meaning of your ruler's dreams. Will you be a true prophet, and grasp at the real meaning of the images in the dream? Or will you try and curry favor with the Tyrant, and become their Favourite?

name: Gamecraft
description: a tongue-in-cheek game design game

name: The Disembodied Hand
description: A three player, GM-less TTRPG about parenthood in Medieval Wales.

name: The Pyramid
